message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.AR, cs.SD

Reasoning: 
1. cs.CL (Computation and Language) - The paper focuses on automatic speech recognition using RNNs, which falls under the scope of this sub-category.
2. cs.LG (Machine Learning) - The paper proposes a novel block-based pruning approach and compiler optimizations to accelerate RNN inference, which involves machine learning techniques.
3. cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) - Although the paper does not explicitly mention computer vision, the proposed approach can potentially be applied to other tasks such as image and video processing that involve RNNs.
4. cs.AR (Hardware Architecture) - The paper discusses hardware acceleration of RNNs on mobile devices, which falls under the scope of this sub-category.
5. cs.SD (Sound) - The paper focuses on speech recognition, which involves sound processing. However, this sub-category may not be as relevant as the other four given the emphasis on machine learning and hardware acceleration.
